oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Grass Bushmen. (L V VIII.-22. 7968 rev. and 7969 re., 7976 and 7977, 7980 and 7981, 7980 rev. and 7081 rev.) . A description of the Grass Bushmen and the names of places in their country. |han=kass'o saw them at a place called 'Bushlice' and at another place there called |koro-tten.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the 'Children of shortness' (the 'Grass Bushmen')
